docs.lead_paragraph: STARTING vocation bureaus to guide children into vocations would be nothing short of organizing a system for exploiting boys and girls.

headline.main: NO JOBS FOR CHILDREN THAT THEY OUGHT TO TAKE; Such Is the Conclusion Reached Through the Vocational Education Survey -- Economic Pressure the Least Potent Reason for Children Leaving School to Go to Work.

docs.snippet: STARTING vocation bureaus to guide children into vocations would be nothing short of organizing a system for exploiting boys and girls.
